summary: A survivor of an attack on a rebel group opposing the Manchu invasion of China creates the Goose Fist fighting technique and tries for revenge on a traitor.
cast: Tao-Liang Tan|James Tien|Jackie Chan|Ching Chu|Pao-Shan Chang|Chun Chao|Feng-Chen Chen|Sheng Chiang|Chi-Chu Chin|Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|In-han Jang|Jeong-Kuk Jang|Phillip Chung-Fung Kwok|Chi-Ming Lam|Ke-Ming Lin|Feng Lu|Ting-Gou Meng|Szu-Cheng Mu|Jan-il Shin|Chin Tang Tang|Wei-Ho Tu|Carter Wong|John Woo|Wei Yang|Biao Yuen|Wah Yuen|Rik Thomas
director: Director: John Woo (as Wu Yu Sheng)
title: La mano de la muerte
